requirements.summary: Add backend capability to store and retrieve motivational messages in Portuguese related to mindfulness and meditation
acceptanceCriteria: Backend stores a curated collection of motivational messages in Portuguese
Messages cover themes of mindfulness, breathing, meditation, self-care, and emotional wellness
At least 15-20 unique motivational messages are available
Messages can be retrieved randomly or sequentially

file_operations.description: Add useGetMotivationalMessage hook that calls the getAllMotivationalMessages backend function and returns a random message from the collection. Use React Query to fetch and cache the message collection, then select a random message on each call. This provides the frontend interface to access motivational messages stored in the backend.

requirements.summary: Display a random motivational message on the home page with refresh capability
acceptanceCriteria: Home page shows a motivational message in a visually prominent card or section
Message changes on page load or includes a refresh button to get a new message
Message display uses calming typography and styling consistent with the meditation theme
Message is clearly distinguishable from navigation cards

file_operations.description: Create a reusable card component that displays a motivational message in Portuguese with calming typography. Include a refresh button icon to fetch a new random message. Style the card with the app's sage green and lavender theme colors, using a subtle background and rounded borders to distinguish it from navigation cards. The component accepts a message string prop and an onRefresh callback.

Add the MotivationalMessageCard component above the existing navigation cards grid. Use the useGetMotivationalMessage hook to fetch a random message on page load. Implement a refresh handler that refetches a new random message. Position the message card prominently at the top of the page content area, ensuring it's visually distinct from the Breathing and Diary navigation cards below.

requirements.summary: Show a motivational message after completing a breathing exercise cycle
acceptanceCriteria: After completing at least one full breathing cycle, display a brief motivational message
Message appears in a non-intrusive way that doesn't interrupt the breathing flow
Message relates to breathing practice, mindfulness, or perseverance
User can dismiss the message or it auto-fades after a few seconds

file_operations.description: Add state to track when a breathing cycle completes (cycle count increases). When cycleCount reaches 1 or higher, fetch and display a motivational message using the useGetMotivationalMessage hook. Show the message in a toast notification or a fade-in overlay that auto-dismisses after 4-5 seconds. Ensure the message display doesn't interrupt the breathing animation. Use the existing toast system or create a subtle overlay component positioned below the main breathing circle.
